menuItems.title: Mixed Berry Yogurt Parfait
menuItems.description: Merry medley of vibrant mixed berries layered with creamy yogurt and crunchy granola

menuItems.title: Tropical Fruit Parfait
menuItems.description: Exotic delight featuring tropical fruits, velvety yogurt, and a sprinkle of toasted coconut

menuItems.title: Chocolate Banana Parfait
menuItems.description: Indulge in layers of rich chocolate, ripe bananas, and creamy yogurt, topped with a drizzle of chocolate sauce

menuItems.title: Strawberry Shortcake Parfait
menuItems.description: Heavenly treat showcasing juicy strawberries, fluffy shortcake, and luscious layers of yogurt

menuItems.title: Matcha Green Tea Parfait
menuItems.description: Blissful fusion of earthy matcha, delicate layers of yogurt, and a touch of sweetness
